events.text: Hey, kid, what’s up?
Charisma is my name and fighting for justice is my game!
This town’s safety lies in the hand of its chosen, Champion Koda the Great!
I’m a superhero in a fallen land, but without my powers I can’t fight bad guys and their evil band.
Are you an evil doer bringing doom and gloom the hero’s land?
Evil doer?
The greatest evil doer!
MUHAHAHA!!!
Gah! A villain standing right before my eyes!
How could I be so careless!
Fear not, ma’am!
Evil doer or not, my cause remains just!
I shall protect you from that doer of dirty deeds!
P-Protect me?
Indeed!
But without my powers I can’t protect those who need my help!
Especially without one secret weapon that only you can give me!
No, I’m a knight of justice!
*snorts*
A knight?! Really?!
That’s right!
A fellow fighter of evil and an encourager of jolly cooperation!
HAZAH!
HAZAH!
Then maybe you can help me as a knight of justice and jolly cooperation!
And how can we help, young Koda?
Without my powers I can’t protect those who need my help!
Especially without one secret weapon that only you can give me!
